channel.title: [PI]Client crashes when i try to get Lunar[PI]
channel.description:
When i go to switch magic to Lunar, my client crashes and this error pops up.
[IMG]http://i1214.photobucket.com/albums/cc492/3lv3nsnip3r/PIclienterrorlunaraltar.jpg[/img]
Does anyone know the answer to this error?

item.title: [PI]Client crashes when i try to get Lunar[PI]
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

cruel ko:

more likely you dont have lunar added and its opening a interface is not there, this was wrong with blank pi ppl spawned alter and changed to lunar and it crashed and everytime they click spellbook it crashes.

Alright, thanks, at least I know whats wrong now. Now i need to add lunar.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI]Client crashes when i try to get Lunar[PI]
